entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 17.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 17.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 11.7°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm before morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 20.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 20. Humidex 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
